subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
Endowments
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The Notre Dame athletic director said the university was seeking endowments for coaching positions, a strategy that he said was related to the changes sweeping through college athletics.
snippet: The Notre Dame athletic director said the university was seeking endowments for coaching positions, a strategy that he said was related to the changes sweeping through college athletics.
